headline: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. Announces Quarterly Common Dividend
summary: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: IVR) today announced that its Board of Directors declared a cash dividend of $0.34 per share of common stock for the first quarter of 2025. The dividend will be paid on April 25, 2025 to stockholders of record at the close of business on April 7, 2025, with an ex-dividend date of April 7, 2025.
